title: Keepalive
name: Keepalive
description: This operation will keep the API session alive ,a new available token will response.

Success 200.description: the value used to validate user's access right

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: Login
name: Login
description: User should login before using other APIs.

Success 200.description: the value used to validate user's access right

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: ConnectDevice
name: ConnectDevice
description: This operation will try to establish a P2P channel between SimCam and SDK Runtime Environment.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.
The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: GetDeviceList
name: GetDeviceList
description: This operation gets user devices list from the SimCam Server.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: GetDeviceState
name: GetDeviceState
description: This operation will request the state of SimCam.

Success 200.description: Resolution of live stream,"1080" stand for 1080p FHD:"1080","720" by default,"360"
Pedestrian tracking which only available for SimCam with Pan:"on","off" by default
Enable Lan Mode which can only see the live stream under the same Lan :"on","off"
The ssid to which SimCam is connected

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: ResetWifi
name: ResetWifi
description: This operation will clear wifi configuration. SimCam will go to scanning QR Code process.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: RotatePan
name: RotatePan
description: This operation will rotate one step to left or right. This function only available for SimCam with Pan.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: SetDeviceState
name: SetDeviceState
description: This operation will set the state of SimCam. Only one state can be changed per request.

Parameter.description: Resolution of live video,"1080" stand for 1080p FHD:"1080","720" by default,"360"
Pedestrian tracking which only available for SimCam with Pan:"on","off" by default
Enable Lan Mode which can only see the live stream under the same Lan :"on","off"

Success 200.description: Resolution of live video,"1080" stand for 1080p FHD:"1080","720" by default,"360"
Pedestrian tracking which only available for SimCam with Pan:"on","off" by default
Enable Lan Mode which can only see the live stream under the same Lan :"on","off"
The ssid to which SimCam is connected

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: UpdateFirmware
name: UpdateFirmware
description: This operation will notify SimCam to update new firmware.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: CloseStream
name: CloseStream
description: This operation will close the stream channel according to the hardwareid.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: GetStreamInfo
name: GetStreamInfo
description: This operation will request the information of stream with this hardwareid.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: GetStreamList
name: GetStreamList
description: This operation will request available streams running in the SDK Runtime Environment.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: OpenStream
name: OpenStream
description: This operation will create a stream channel according to the hardwareid.

Parameter.description: The port of rtsp server, 554 by default
Enable metadata embeded in live stream:"on","off" by default

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: GetEventInfo
name: GetEventInfo
description: This operation will request available event type information.

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: RedirectEvent
name: RedirectEvent
description: This operation will redirect default http/https event message to user's URL.

Parameter.description: The name of event to redirect:"all" if want to redirect all

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.

title: UnbindEvent
name: UnbindEvent
description: This operation will unbind event message to user's URL.

Parameter.description: The name of event to unbind:"all" if want to unbind all

Header.description: The token can be generated from /login or /keepalive.
